LanguageData.DMS_Mech_BattleFrame.label: battle friend
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_BattleFrame.description: Designed to be a light infantry fighting unit. battle friend has a considerable load capacity and ability to use most of human equipments, which isn't surpised that it has been mass-services by forces and depoly in various environments when it can equip heavy weapon with amount of ammo.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_BattleFrame.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_EscortLifter.label: escort lifter
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_EscortLifter.description: As an early stage mass-production automatroid, even though it's no longer a standard service equipment, there're still lots of them modified to used for transportation purpose.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_EscortLifter.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_FieldCommand.label: field command
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_FieldCommand.description: a battle friend sub-variant model. it can be the mechnitor command relay but due to its weight with reduced fire control system, which can only equip a light weapon for self defense.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_FieldCommand.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_ShaftWorker.label: shaft worker
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_ShaftWorker.description: As an early stage mass-production automatroid, even though it's no longer a standard service equipment, there're still lots of them modified to used for mining and construct purpose.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_ShaftWorker.tools.head.label: head
